title: PCDeliverableObligationCharac
description: A class to specify the Partial Cash Deliverable Obligation Characteristic.

applicable.description: Indicates whether the provision is applicable.

partialCashSettlement.description: Specifies whether either 'Partial Cash Settlement of Assignable Loans', 'Partial Cash Settlement of Consent Required Loans' or 'Partial Cash Settlement of Participations' is applicable. If this element is specified and Assignable Loan is a Deliverable Obligation Characteristic, any Assignable Loan that is deliverable, but where a non-receipt of Consent by the Physical Settlement Date has occurred, the Loan can be cash settled rather than physically delivered. If this element is specified and Consent Required Loan is a Deliverable Obligation Characteristic, any Consent Required Loan that is deliverable, but where a non-receipt of Consent by the Physical Settlement Date has occurred, the Loan can be cash settled rather than physically delivered. If this element is specified and Direct Loan Participation is a Deliverable Obligation Characteristic, any Participation that is deliverable, but where this participation has not been effected (has not come into effect) by the Physical Settlement Date, the participation can be cash settled rather than physically delivered.
